extension.summary: Chinook - Global Context Menu Items
Chinook - Algemene contextmenu-items
extension.description: Adds Context Menu items for chinook menu items throughout Kodi
Voegt contextmenu-items toe voor chinook-menu-items in Kodi
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.news:
Changelog 2.1.1: Implemented a workaround for broken future.backports module method (fixes Leia issues)
Changelog 2.1.0: Refactored code to modern standards Use backported URL lib for py2 to ensure unicode compatibility Extracted out common functions and reused Add settings to enable/disable individual items Add more localizations Add GitHub issue templates
Changelog 2.0.2: Make python version agnostic
Changelog 2.0.1: Fixed addon icons/fanart
Changelog 2.0.0: Rework for chinook 2.0

extension.summary: Chinook - Modular Multi-source Addon
extension.description: Chinook is a modular provider based, cloud service streaming software that is tightly interwoven with Trakt. Chinook provides the freedom to view media from a single menu system from service providers of the users choosing. Please Note: This addon requires the use of a compatible cloud service.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007

extension.news:
Changelog 2.1.5 Workaround trakt shitty season data Added trakt list sort types for Watched, Collected and My Rating Fix trakt season milling for updated shows Fix mill_if_needed queries for seasons and episodes Use cache for first load of widgets for trakt lists Force a cache clear on release version changes Update seasons statistics again, with even more fallbacks Ensure we clean up AD/RD cloudfiles if we can't identify the file to play Fixed typo in url for widget refresh from activities sync Allow widget refresh while playing for foreground tasks Fix air dates not always showed correctly for shows/seasons Fix tzlocal call to pytz.tzinfo.build_tzinfo and update pytz to 2021.3 Hide trakt auth option if we are already authed Change icons to transparent background Use an empty content type value for menu containers Added 'an' to the list of excluded sort tokens Update Dutch translations Update French translations Add Polish translations
Changelog 2.1.4 Genre and Next Page icons Improve widget refresh logic Update show/season statistics after reinserting from updated meta Perform trakt sync on system resume Support kodi standard addon localisations Fix downloads Fix hide shows from episodes/season items Add "Auto-Delete Torrents" for AD Fix RD torrents not auto-deleting Fix broken cache cleaning Don't use show OMDB data for seasons Remove update checker Localize custom windows Use show ids for setUniqueIDs Always mill specials Optimise TVDB threading Optimise filter_dictionary and safe_dict_get Increase requests connection pool size Don't use dict.keys() when unnecessary Some minor fixes and optimisations to tools and globals Minor performance improvement to the sqlite row factory Optimise TZ initialisation Debounce onSettingsChanged callback in chinookMonitor Added database indices to episodes, movies, hidden and bookmarks tables
Changelog 2.1.3 Workaround Kodi's lack of multi-process settings management Fix Trakt updated endpoints now only support 30 days from "now" Fix call to get_url in RD account status check and enhanced PM and AD account status checks Fix Trakt IDs being sent wrong to windows
Changelog 2.1.2 Fix RD auth when there are existing values in settings.xml Get debrid premium status immediately after auth and improve values/handling Make Trakt auth for widget loads needing auth to wait for auth Ensure all trakt API instances always get latest auth tokens Fix Trakt revoke auth issues that led to bad values in settings.xml Don't wipe user data in trakt sync db on trakt revoke auth unless next authed user is different Fix clipboard copy to work on Linux under Matrix and and add MacOS support Fix season milling requires update check Fix adding unaired items to watchlist from search when hide unaired is enabled Fix eternal trakt IDs for trakt addon ratings/scrobbling for episodes Fix trakt list sorting direction for rank sorting Don't cache personal trakt lists Reorder code path in GlobalLock to avoid rare race condition Fix Long life service manager does not exit when kodi requests it to Change InputStream Helper dependency to optional Gracefully handle bad dates in OMDB indexer Improved settings cache thread locking Handle None/empty values better in settings cache VACCUM during DB rebuild (reclaim disk space)
Changelog 2.1.1 Fix RD losing auth issue Improve OAUTH refresh flow edge case coverage for Trakt and TVDB Re-implement retry on db lock during sql execution Fix an issue with GlobalLock run_once exiting too early Fix several shows views on demand insertion of missing data Fix movies genres on demand insertion of missing data Update season episode count after episode milling (fixes seasons showing incorrectly as watched) Fix minimum size filter
Changelog 2.1.0 Major re-work of metadata updates and merging Fix air dates not being updated Fix missing artwork not being updated Fix meta data merging Improved meta data fallback processing Improve global and sync locks, reduce thread locking Improve caching code to reduce required requests. Additional caching for metadata indexer endpoints Improve database handling code Improve timezone detection fallback handling Make chinook python version agnostic Implemented a true settings cache Brought back test windows feature for skin developers Moved to kodi module version of unidecode Updated pytz to latest release Fix mysql Kodi database support under Leia Removed youtube dependency Workaround for type error in CacheAssist quality filter Fix resolver window error when no sources found Remove argv usage from SmartPlay Reworked forced widget refresh approach Logging cleanup
Changelog 2.0.19 Fix handling of unicode in URLs, TV Networks and Searching issues on Leia Fix TV show years Fix PM CacheAssist status updates Only try to auto-cache if auto-cache is actually enabled Change default threadpool size and provide user settings Increase timeout configuration setting maximum permitted value Make pre-scrape respect new maximum value for timeout Change approach for deaccenting clean_title and transliterate actor names During prescrape, don't pop up the too restrictive filters window and just use unfiltered list for sorting Fix Kodi Bookmark Clearing with MySQL DB support Temporarily disable totaltime progress indicators as they break our resume on Matrix Fix TVDB session issues Fix XBOX Database Issues Fix database pickling issues Fix Kodi crashes in Leia Fix Kodi crashes in Matrix (with exception of reuselanguageinvoker enabled when stopping playback combined with widgets) Change default value of reuselanguageinvoker to False and force use addon provided value on upgrade Ensure we release all Kodi objects to prevent memory leaks and crashes Ensure we close all requests sessions to prevent memory leaks Workaround occasional python bug with strptime in lambda functions Made Kodi version detection algorithm more resilient and cover pre-release versions Logging enhancements Added Arabic translations
Changelog 2.0.18 Fix the thread pool issues Added logic to push down the country_origin to be used by the scrapers Original title swap now only occurs for display, use unicode everywhere Fixed normalization function retuning unnormalized values Fix for genre multi-select always showing same items Fixed local TZ conversion for dates in Upcoming, Source Select and OSD Real Debrid use status_codes to determine what are good requests Make sure we have all parts for the calculation of the bookmarks Added regex to parse semver out of version label Re-implemented update checker that will work regardless of repo changes
Changelog 2.0.17: Fix for shows search and TVDB empty data Fix handling of timestamp creation to be UTC compliant Fix timezone code taking unix path on Windows Added a fall through for android getprop timezone detection Handle invalid dates from metadata indexer when obtaining year value. Fix Matrix UI spins on closing download manager Add check for invalid list position in download manager returned by an empty list Fix isFolder bool for download manager Fix resume progress indicators Calculate resumetime at bookmark insert for movies Add support for clearing bookmarks on Matrix Fix view_type has no attribute isdigit bug Ensure studio info value in seasons/episodes Add provider package version information to existing logging item Handle removal of legacy provider meta file both on uninstall and upgrade Replaced seekTime with execute of BigSkipForward Fix Simplejson decode error not caught bug Handle exception instances from a4ksubtitles Fix pagination for genre multi-select Fix paging of Finish Watching has same items bug Fixed show pack suffixes and checking of 1x1 episode naming Updated missing codes and added it-IT, fr-FR and ar-SA translations Update Danish language strings
Changelog 2.0.16: Fix addon update check Fix trakt module attempting to refresh when not authorised
Changelog 2.0.15: Fixed python depend
Changelog 2.0.14: Fixed scraping issue if title is not present at IMDB Added workarounds for syncing trakt database on xbox Fixed Trending/Popular Trakt lists repeating Seperated sort and pagination setting for Trakt collection Applied sort and pagination settings for collection to unfinished shows in collection Re-worked date handling to use UTC for all internal uses and convert to local on display Fixed pagination on recently watched shows menu Fixed source sorting issue for py3 Fixed race condition in pre-term for py3 File size now displayed on resolver dialog Updated some dutch translations Fixed hosters not being handled correctly at scrape Fix reuselanguageinvoker default Fixed background sync attempting to run when no Trakt auth present
Changelog 2.0.13 Fixed settings not sticking when using reuselanguageinvoker Fixed reuselanguageinvoke status not sticking after toggling Reuselangugageinvoker state now forced on startup Reduced Trakt retries on server failures Increased backoff timeout for retries Fixed playback for special episodes failing Eased timeout issues for bookmarks Fixed non-direct, non-debrid hosters appearing in source select Fix spanish translation file name Fixed title sorting for lists with articles Fixed paging on new shows
Changelog 2.0.12 Fix for source select, tested on 4 skins
Changelog 2.0.11 Take preventative measures to reduce overloading Trakt servers Increase local show/season statistic refreshing Fixed cloud source sorting Fixed HEVC source sorting New shows api call now pulls english and local language from Trakt Modified database commit method to allow for xbox support Reformat source select screen again to allow better filename displaying Fixed next button showing on next up menu Removed pycryptodome dependency, this will need to be requested on a per provider basis Fixed pre-term Fixed empty search results raising exception Fixed auto episode resuming Fixed superficial exceptions in play dialogs Updated danish language strings
Changelog 2.0.10 Fixed issue with milling seasons to often Added checks when attempting to cache magnet Fixed tvshows new Fetching of RD account details after auth fixed Fixed spanish translation folder name Reformat of source select to allow larger file name sizes Fixed race condition in ThreadPool Added fallback for text color if skin color could not be inherited Add legacy param support for smart play playlist creation Fix hide the hiding of unaired episodes from non mixed episode lists Removed default action setting until a appropriate workaround for kodi setting is achieved Wrapped player interactions with Trakt API with Try/Excepts to allow network failures Added fallback method if no thumb art is available Added temporary workaround for ratings issue in add_directory_items Fixed keep-alive in player module. (Fixes dialogs, playlist creation, marking as watched if not caused by network failure) Allowed exceptions in cache check to allow for debrid providers who are offline Replaced ok dialogs for connection issues with notifications
Changelog 2.0.9: Fixed RD cloud scraping Fixed issue if all providers were disabled scraping would run as if all were enabled Fixed smartplay and legacy paramas support Fixed bug causing failure when checking art from TMDB Fixed user lists menus Added spanish translation Fixed backing out from menu when opened from widget (having to backout multiple times) Fixed season watch markers Fixed hidden_items handling with New Shows menu
Changelog 2.0.8: Temporary Workaround for trakt items not providing trakt_id Better RD episode resolving Better episode identification during resolving Catch WindowsError exception when handling skins Fix text highlight selection Cool down background service on failure
Changelog 2.0.7: Fixed All debrid torrent resolving Fixed movie resuming Fixed issue with limited providers running at scrape Fixed AD re-auth Changes to attempt to fix XBOX support and ascii issues with timezones Fixed unaired episodes showing blank Fixed AD User info fetching Fixed ghost providers Fixed TypeError with pre-termination
Changelog 2.0.6: Create Skins directory if missing Allow failure in pre-term until investigated
Changelog 2.0.5: Allow more failures that will require to be investigated further in the future
Changelog 2.0.4: Safe get release title when cloud scraping Allow and log failures in maintenance process
Changelog 2.0.3: Added default value of None for skin color when attempting to pull color from user's skin
Changelog 2.0.2: Force table re-fresh is sync database fails to rebuild when updating
Changelog 2.0.1: Fix last_meta_update value to reflect new chinook version
Changleog 2.0.0:
Added Download Manager Complete re-write of Trakt Sync Database Metadata handler introduced and complete re-write of handling of metadata Settings that modify metadata can now be changed on the fly and do not require a rebuild Users can now manually resolve a file from the source select screen Users can now manually cache a specific source from the source select screen Complete re-write of menu handling Introduced globals module to handle global variables for interpreter Implement re-use language invoker setting from Kodi Pre-emptive termination now disabled for background Pre-scrapes and timeout set to max for background scrapes New artwork and custom dialogs Metadata now upadted on the fly when updated item encountered from Trakt Next Up menu now populated from local database Sync has been fleshed out to include even more meta data during cycle Failures to auto resolve now prompt user in case they wish to manually interrupt Items are now able to supply multiple images for any given type for skins that make use of it Support for Python 3 Global thread lock now implemented for required methods (prevents multiple syncs occuring at once and other locks) InputStreamAdaptive support Providers now have the abiity to implement settings Provider packages can now elect to make use of their own background services Provider packages can now offer images for each provider Cache and Sync database items are now pickled Complete re-write of resovler module and consolidated code Kodi 19 support All Debrid implementation now fully featured Sources can now be sorted by filesize low to high for users that wish to do so Forcing widget refresh after playback now optional Zip manager implemented for handling of zip files Skin Manager rework Automated resolving now more reliable OMDB API implemented Feedback provided at scrape if no providers are found Feedback provided at scrape if no debrid providers are setup Debrid account status now visible from chinook settings

Changleog 2.0.0:
Added Download Manager Complete re-write of Trakt Sync Database Metadata handler introduced and complete re-write of handling of metadata Settings that modify metadata can now be changed on the fly and do not require a rebuild Users can now manually resolve a file from the source select screen Users can now manually cache a specific source from the source select screen Complete re-write of menu handling Introduced globals module to handle global variables for interpreter Implement re-use language invoker setting from Kodi Pre-emptive termination now disabled for background Pre-scrapes and timeout set to max for background scrapes New artwork and custom dialogs Metadata now upadted on the fly when updated item encountered from Trakt Next Up menu now populated from local database Sync has been fleshed out to include even more meta data during cycle Failures to auto resolve now prompt user in case they wish to manually interrupt Items are now able to supply multiple images for any given type for skins that make use of it Support for Python 3 Global thread lock now implemented for required methods (prevents multiple syncs occuring at once and other locks) InputStreamAdaptive support Providers now have the abiity to implement settings Provider packages can now elect to make use of their own background services Provider packages can now offer images for each provider Cache and Sync database items are now pickled Complete re-write of resovler module and consolidated code Kodi 19 support All Debrid implementation now fully featured Sources can now be sorted by filesize low to high for users that wish to do so Forcing widget refresh after playback now optional Zip manager implemented for handling of zip files Skin Manager rework Automated resolving now more reliable OMDB API implemented Feedback provided at scrape if no providers are found Feedback provided at scrape if no debrid providers are setup Debrid account status now visible from coho settings

extension.summary: Halibut - Modular Multi-source Addon
extension.description: Halibut is a modular provider based, cloud service streaming software that is tightly interwoven with Trakt. Halibut provides the freedom to view media from a single menu system from service providers of the users choosing. Please Note: This addon requires the use of a compatible cloud service.

extension.news:
Changelog 2.1.5 Workaround trakt shitty season data Added trakt list sort types for Watched, Collected and My Rating Fix trakt season milling for updated shows Fix mill_if_needed queries for seasons and episodes Use cache for first load of widgets for trakt lists Force a cache clear on release version changes Update seasons statistics again, with even more fallbacks Ensure we clean up AD/RD cloudfiles if we can't identify the file to play Fixed typo in url for widget refresh from activities sync Allow widget refresh while playing for foreground tasks Fix air dates not always showed correctly for shows/seasons Fix tzlocal call to pytz.tzinfo.build_tzinfo and update pytz to 2021.3 Hide trakt auth option if we are already authed Change icons to transparent background Use an empty content type value for menu containers Added 'an' to the list of excluded sort tokens Update Dutch translations Update French translations Add Polish translations
Changelog 2.1.4 Genre and Next Page icons Improve widget refresh logic Update show/season statistics after reinserting from updated meta Perform trakt sync on system resume Support kodi standard addon localisations Fix downloads Fix hide shows from episodes/season items Add "Auto-Delete Torrents" for AD Fix RD torrents not auto-deleting Fix broken cache cleaning Don't use show OMDB data for seasons Remove update checker Localize custom windows Use show ids for setUniqueIDs Always mill specials Optimise TVDB threading Optimise filter_dictionary and safe_dict_get Increase requests connection pool size Don't use dict.keys() when unnecessary Some minor fixes and optimisations to tools and globals Minor performance improvement to the sqlite row factory Optimise TZ initialisation Debounce onSettingsChanged callback in halibutMonitor Added database indices to episodes, movies, hidden and bookmarks tables
Changelog 2.1.3 Workaround Kodi's lack of multi-process settings management Fix Trakt updated endpoints now only support 30 days from "now" Fix call to get_url in RD account status check and enhanced PM and AD account status checks Fix Trakt IDs being sent wrong to windows
Changelog 2.1.2 Fix RD auth when there are existing values in settings.xml Get debrid premium status immediately after auth and improve values/handling Make Trakt auth for widget loads needing auth to wait for auth Ensure all trakt API instances always get latest auth tokens Fix Trakt revoke auth issues that led to bad values in settings.xml Don't wipe user data in trakt sync db on trakt revoke auth unless next authed user is different Fix clipboard copy to work on Linux under Matrix and and add MacOS support Fix season milling requires update check Fix adding unaired items to watchlist from search when hide unaired is enabled Fix eternal trakt IDs for trakt addon ratings/scrobbling for episodes Fix trakt list sorting direction for rank sorting Don't cache personal trakt lists Reorder code path in GlobalLock to avoid rare race condition Fix Long life service manager does not exit when kodi requests it to Change InputStream Helper dependency to optional Gracefully handle bad dates in OMDB indexer Improved settings cache thread locking Handle None/empty values better in settings cache VACCUM during DB rebuild (reclaim disk space)
Changelog 2.1.1 Fix RD losing auth issue Improve OAUTH refresh flow edge case coverage for Trakt and TVDB Re-implement retry on db lock during sql execution Fix an issue with GlobalLock run_once exiting too early Fix several shows views on demand insertion of missing data Fix movies genres on demand insertion of missing data Update season episode count after episode milling (fixes seasons showing incorrectly as watched) Fix minimum size filter
Changelog 2.1.0 Major re-work of metadata updates and merging Fix air dates not being updated Fix missing artwork not being updated Fix meta data merging Improved meta data fallback processing Improve global and sync locks, reduce thread locking Improve caching code to reduce required requests. Additional caching for metadata indexer endpoints Improve database handling code Improve timezone detection fallback handling Make halibut python version agnostic Implemented a true settings cache Brought back test windows feature for skin developers Moved to kodi module version of unidecode Updated pytz to latest release Fix mysql Kodi database support under Leia Removed youtube dependency Workaround for type error in CacheAssist quality filter Fix resolver window error when no sources found Remove argv usage from SmartPlay Reworked forced widget refresh approach Logging cleanup
Changelog 2.0.19 Fix handling of unicode in URLs, TV Networks and Searching issues on Leia Fix TV show years Fix PM CacheAssist status updates Only try to auto-cache if auto-cache is actually enabled Change default threadpool size and provide user settings Increase timeout configuration setting maximum permitted value Make pre-scrape respect new maximum value for timeout Change approach for deaccenting clean_title and transliterate actor names During prescrape, don't pop up the too restrictive filters window and just use unfiltered list for sorting Fix Kodi Bookmark Clearing with MySQL DB support Temporarily disable totaltime progress indicators as they break our resume on Matrix Fix TVDB session issues Fix XBOX Database Issues Fix database pickling issues Fix Kodi crashes in Leia Fix Kodi crashes in Matrix (with exception of reuselanguageinvoker enabled when stopping playback combined with widgets) Change default value of reuselanguageinvoker to False and force use addon provided value on upgrade Ensure we release all Kodi objects to prevent memory leaks and crashes Ensure we close all requests sessions to prevent memory leaks Workaround occasional python bug with strptime in lambda functions Made Kodi version detection algorithm more resilient and cover pre-release versions Logging enhancements Added Arabic translations
Changelog 2.0.18 Fix the thread pool issues Added logic to push down the country_origin to be used by the scrapers Original title swap now only occurs for display, use unicode everywhere Fixed normalization function retuning unnormalized values Fix for genre multi-select always showing same items Fixed local TZ conversion for dates in Upcoming, Source Select and OSD Real Debrid use status_codes to determine what are good requests Make sure we have all parts for the calculation of the bookmarks Added regex to parse semver out of version label Re-implemented update checker that will work regardless of repo changes
Changelog 2.0.17: Fix for shows search and TVDB empty data Fix handling of timestamp creation to be UTC compliant Fix timezone code taking unix path on Windows Added a fall through for android getprop timezone detection Handle invalid dates from metadata indexer when obtaining year value. Fix Matrix UI spins on closing download manager Add check for invalid list position in download manager returned by an empty list Fix isFolder bool for download manager Fix resume progress indicators Calculate resumetime at bookmark insert for movies Add support for clearing bookmarks on Matrix Fix view_type has no attribute isdigit bug Ensure studio info value in seasons/episodes Add provider package version information to existing logging item Handle removal of legacy provider meta file both on uninstall and upgrade Replaced seekTime with execute of BigSkipForward Fix Simplejson decode error not caught bug Handle exception instances from a4ksubtitles Fix pagination for genre multi-select Fix paging of Finish Watching has same items bug Fixed show pack suffixes and checking of 1x1 episode naming Updated missing codes and added it-IT, fr-FR and ar-SA translations Update Danish language strings
Changelog 2.0.16: Fix addon update check Fix trakt module attempting to refresh when not authorised
Changelog 2.0.15: Fixed python depend
Changelog 2.0.14: Fixed scraping issue if title is not present at IMDB Added workarounds for syncing trakt database on xbox Fixed Trending/Popular Trakt lists repeating Seperated sort and pagination setting for Trakt collection Applied sort and pagination settings for collection to unfinished shows in collection Re-worked date handling to use UTC for all internal uses and convert to local on display Fixed pagination on recently watched shows menu Fixed source sorting issue for py3 Fixed race condition in pre-term for py3 File size now displayed on resolver dialog Updated some dutch translations Fixed hosters not being handled correctly at scrape Fix reuselanguageinvoker default Fixed background sync attempting to run when no Trakt auth present
Changelog 2.0.13 Fixed settings not sticking when using reuselanguageinvoker Fixed reuselanguageinvoke status not sticking after toggling Reuselangugageinvoker state now forced on startup Reduced Trakt retries on server failures Increased backoff timeout for retries Fixed playback for special episodes failing Eased timeout issues for bookmarks Fixed non-direct, non-debrid hosters appearing in source select Fix spanish translation file name Fixed title sorting for lists with articles Fixed paging on new shows
Changelog 2.0.12 Fix for source select, tested on 4 skins
Changelog 2.0.11 Take preventative measures to reduce overloading Trakt servers Increase local show/season statistic refreshing Fixed cloud source sorting Fixed HEVC source sorting New shows api call now pulls english and local language from Trakt Modified database commit method to allow for xbox support Reformat source select screen again to allow better filename displaying Fixed next button showing on next up menu Removed pycryptodome dependency, this will need to be requested on a per provider basis Fixed pre-term Fixed empty search results raising exception Fixed auto episode resuming Fixed superficial exceptions in play dialogs Updated danish language strings
Changelog 2.0.10 Fixed issue with milling seasons to often Added checks when attempting to cache magnet Fixed tvshows new Fetching of RD account details after auth fixed Fixed spanish translation folder name Reformat of source select to allow larger file name sizes Fixed race condition in ThreadPool Added fallback for text color if skin color could not be inherited Add legacy param support for smart play playlist creation Fix hide the hiding of unaired episodes from non mixed episode lists Removed default action setting until a appropriate workaround for kodi setting is achieved Wrapped player interactions with Trakt API with Try/Excepts to allow network failures Added fallback method if no thumb art is available Added temporary workaround for ratings issue in add_directory_items Fixed keep-alive in player module. (Fixes dialogs, playlist creation, marking as watched if not caused by network failure) Allowed exceptions in cache check to allow for debrid providers who are offline Replaced ok dialogs for connection issues with notifications
Changelog 2.0.9: Fixed RD cloud scraping Fixed issue if all providers were disabled scraping would run as if all were enabled Fixed smartplay and legacy paramas support Fixed bug causing failure when checking art from TMDB Fixed user lists menus Added spanish translation Fixed backing out from menu when opened from widget (having to backout multiple times) Fixed season watch markers Fixed hidden_items handling with New Shows menu
Changelog 2.0.8: Temporary Workaround for trakt items not providing trakt_id Better RD episode resolving Better episode identification during resolving Catch WindowsError exception when handling skins Fix text highlight selection Cool down background service on failure
Changelog 2.0.7: Fixed All debrid torrent resolving Fixed movie resuming Fixed issue with limited providers running at scrape Fixed AD re-auth Changes to attempt to fix XBOX support and ascii issues with timezones Fixed unaired episodes showing blank Fixed AD User info fetching Fixed ghost providers Fixed TypeError with pre-termination
Changelog 2.0.6: Create Skins directory if missing Allow failure in pre-term until investigated
Changelog 2.0.5: Allow more failures that will require to be investigated further in the future
Changelog 2.0.4: Safe get release title when cloud scraping Allow and log failures in maintenance process
Changelog 2.0.3: Added default value of None for skin color when attempting to pull color from user's skin
Changelog 2.0.2: Force table re-fresh is sync database fails to rebuild when updating
Changelog 2.0.1: Fix last_meta_update value to reflect new halibut version
Changleog 2.0.0:
Added Download Manager Complete re-write of Trakt Sync Database Metadata handler introduced and complete re-write of handling of metadata Settings that modify metadata can now be changed on the fly and do not require a rebuild Users can now manually resolve a file from the source select screen Users can now manually cache a specific source from the source select screen Complete re-write of menu handling Introduced globals module to handle global variables for interpreter Implement re-use language invoker setting from Kodi Pre-emptive termination now disabled for background Pre-scrapes and timeout set to max for background scrapes New artwork and custom dialogs Metadata now upadted on the fly when updated item encountered from Trakt Next Up menu now populated from local database Sync has been fleshed out to include even more meta data during cycle Failures to auto resolve now prompt user in case they wish to manually interrupt Items are now able to supply multiple images for any given type for skins that make use of it Support for Python 3 Global thread lock now implemented for required methods (prevents multiple syncs occuring at once and other locks) InputStreamAdaptive support Providers now have the abiity to implement settings Provider packages can now elect to make use of their own background services Provider packages can now offer images for each provider Cache and Sync database items are now pickled Complete re-write of resovler module and consolidated code Kodi 19 support All Debrid implementation now fully featured Sources can now be sorted by filesize low to high for users that wish to do so Forcing widget refresh after playback now optional Zip manager implemented for handling of zip files Skin Manager rework Automated resolving now more reliable OMDB API implemented Feedback provided at scrape if no providers are found Feedback provided at scrape if no debrid providers are setup Debrid account status now visible from halibut settings

extension.summary: TheMovieDb Helper - Now With Trakt Support!

extension.description: Chinook is die bestek oortreksel vir Kodi 17.0 en op. Dit poog om maklik te wees vir eerste keer Kodi gebruikers om te verstaan en te gebruik.
Chinook - прадвызначаная абалонка для Kodi 17.0 і пазнейшых версій. Яна будзе простай і зразумелай для карыстальнікаў, якія не мелі досведу працы з Kodi.
Chinook е стандартният облик на Kodi 17 и по-новите версии. Целта е да се улеснят хората, които се сблъскват за първи път с Kodi.
Chinook és l'aparença predeterminada de Kodi 17.0 i posteriors. Per als usuaris per primera vegada de Kodi, intenta ser fàcil d'entendre i d'utilitzar.
Chinook je výchozí vzhled pro Kodi 17.0 a vyšší. Snaží se být jednoduše pochopitelný a použitelný pro nové uživatele Kodi.
Chinook er standardbrugerfladen for Kodi 17.0 og højere. Det forenkler førstegangsbrugen af Kodi ved at gøre det nemmere at forstå og bruge.
Chinook ist der Standardskin für Kodi 17.0 und höher. Ziel war es, einen einfach zu bedienenden Skin für neue Kodi-Benutzer zu entwickeln.
Το Chinook είναι η προεπιλεγμένη αμφίεση για τις εκδόσεις Kodi 17.0 και άνω. Επιχειρεί να είναι προσιτό στους αρχάριους χρήστες του Kodi για να το κατανοήσουν και να το χρησιμοποιήσουν.
Chinook is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
Chinook is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
Chinook is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
Chinook es el skin por defecto para Kodi 17.0 y posteriores. Intenta ser fácil de entender y utilizar para los usuarios Kodi primerizos.
Chinook es el skin por defecto para Kodi 17.0 o superior. Su objetivo es la facilidad de comprensión y uso para usuarios primerizos de Kodi.
Chinook es la máscara por defecto para Kodi 17.0 y superior. Su objetivo es ser fácil de entender y usar para los usuarios nuevos a Kodi.
Chinook on vaikimisi Kodi rüü versioonist 17.0. Kodi esmakasutajatel on rüüd kerge mõista ja kasutada.
Chinook azala kodi 17.0 eta berriagoen azal lehenetsia da. Kodiren erabiltzaile hasiberrientzako erabilerraza eta ulerterraza izaten saiatzen da.
Chinook on oletusulkoasu Kodin versiosta 17.0 lähtien. Se pyrkii olemaan helppo ymmärtää ja käyttää Kodin ensikäyttäjille.
Chinook est l’habillage par défaut pour Kodi 17.0 et ultérieure. Il s’efforce d’être facile à comprendre et à utiliser pour les utilisateurs débutants de Kodi.
Chinook est l'habillage d'origine pour Kodi 17.0 et supérieur. Il est facile à comprendre et à utiliser pour les utilisateurs novices de Kodi.
Chinook é a pel predefinida para Kodi 17.0 e superior. Esta tenta ser doada de entender e usar polos usuarios recen chegados a Kodi.
Chinook היא מעטפת ברירת המחדל של קודי מגרסאות 17.0 ומעלה. מטרת מעטפת זו היא להיות פשוטה לשימוש ולהכרה ראשונית על ידי משתמשים חדשים.
Chinook je uobičajena presvlaka za Kodi 17.0 i novije inačice. To je pokušaj da se novim korisnicima olakša prvo korištenje i kasnija upotreba Kodija.
Az Chinook az alapértelmezett felszín a 17.0 és újabb Kodi kiadásokban. Megpróbál könnyen kezelhető és használható lenni, az újonc Kodi felhasználóknak is.
Chinook er sjálfgefið skinn fyrir Kodi 17.0 og nýrri. Með því á að vera auðvelt fyrir fyrsta-skiptis Kodi-notendur að skilja og nota viðmótið.
Chinook è la skin predefinita di Kodi 17.0 e successivi. Cerca di essere facile da capire e usare per i nuovi utenti di Kodi.
ChinookはKodi 17.0およびそれ以上のバージョンで標準のスキンです。ユーザーが初めてKodiに触れる際にわかりやすく使えるようにしてあります。
Chinook는 Kodi 17.0이상의 기본 스킨입니다. 처음 Kodi를 접하는 사용자가 쉽게 이해하고 사용할 수 있도록 만들었습니다.
Chinook yra numatytoji Kodi 17.0 ir aukštesnių versijų teminė išvaizda. Jos tikslas yra būti lengvai perprantama naujiems Kodi vartotojams.
Chinook ialah kulit lalai untuk Kodi 17.0 dan ke atas. Kulit yang mudah digunakan buat pengguna Kodi kali pertama untuk memahami dan menggunakannya.
Chinook er forvalgt drakt til Kodi 17.0 og nyere. Det tar mål av seg å være en enkel drakt for førstegangsbrukere av Kodi, slik at det er til å forstå og kan brukes.
Chinook is de standaardskin voor Kodi 17.0 en hoger. Het tracht eenvoudig te begrijpen en te gebruiken te zijn voor beginnende Kodi-gebruikers.
Eustary jest domyślną skórą Kodi dla wersji 17.0 i późniejszych. Jest próbą łatwego wprowadzenia początkujących użytkowników w funkcje Kodi.
Chinook é a skin padrão para o Kodi 17.0 e acima. Objetiva ser fácil para usuários que iniciam no Kodi pela primeira vez, facilitando aprendizagem de uso do mesmo.
O Chinook é o visual por omissão para o Kodi 17.0 e posteriores. Tenta ser simples para os utilizadores menos experientes do Kodi compreenderem e usarem.
Chinook este tema implicită pentru Kodi 17.0 și versiunile ulterioare. Încearcă să fie ușor de înțeles și folosit pentru utilizatorii care folosesc Kodi pentru prima dată.
Chinook — это стандартная обложка Kodi, начиная с версии 17.0. Простая и понятная в использовании для новых пользователей Kodi.
Chinook je predvolený vzhľad pre Kodi 17.0 a vyššie. Je výsledkom snahy o vzhľad, ktorý bude ľahko zrozumiteľný a použiteľný pre nových používateľov Kodi.
Chinook је подразумевана маска за Kodi 17.0 и изнад. Покушава да буде једноставан за разумевање и коришћење новим корисницима Kodi-ја.
Chinook je podrazumevana maska za Kodi 17.0 i iznad. Pokušava da bude jednostavan za razumevanje i korišćenje novim korisnicima Kodija.
Chinook är standardskalet för Kodi 17.0 och uppåt. Det är utformat för att vara lättförståeligt och användarvänligt för förstagångsanvändare av Kodi.
Chinook je wychodnōm skōrōm Kodi dlŏ wersyje 17.0 i dalszych. Prōbuje być proste dlŏ używŏczōw, dlŏ kerych Kodi je nowe
Chinook คือหน้าตาเริ่มต้นของ Kodi 17.0 และสูงกว่า เป็นความพยายามที่จะทำให้ง่ายสำหรับผู้ใช้ Kodi ในครั้งแรก ที่จะเข้าใจและใช้งาน
Chinook Kodi 17.0 ve yukarısı için varsayılan dış görünümdür. İlk kez Kodi kullananlar için anlaşılması ve kullanımı kolaydır.
Chinook є стандартною обкладинкою Kodi 17.0 і подальших версій. Її основна ідея — простота використання для нових користувачів Kodi.
Chinook là giao diện mặc định cho Kodi 17.0 trở lên. Nó dễ dàng cho người dùng Kodi lần đầu tiên hiểu và sử dụng.
Chinook 是 Kodi 17.0 的默认皮肤。它力求使首次使用 Kodi 的用户易于上手。
Chinook是Kodi 17.0開始搭載的預設佈景主題。主要在讓第一次使用 Kodi 的使用者可以簡單地上手。
extension.disclaimer: Chinook is die bestek oortreksel vir Kodi, verwydering mag probleme veroorsaak
Chinook - прадвызначаная абалонка для Kodi. Яе выдаленне можа прывесці да праблем
Chinook е стандартният облик на Kodi. Премахването му може да предизвика проблеми
Chinook és l'aparença predeterminada de Kodi, si s'elimina pot causar problemes.
Chinook je výchozí vzhled pro Kodi, jeho odebrání může způsobit problémy
Chinook yw croen diofyn Kodi. Efallai bydd ei dynnu yn achosi problemau
Chinook er standard brugerfladen. Fjernes det kan der opstå problemer.
Chinook ist der Standardskin von Kodi. Ein Entfernen des Skins kann Probleme verursachen.
Το Chinook είναι η προεπιλεγμένη αμφίεση για το Kodi. Η αφαίρεσή του μπορεί να δημιουργήσει προβλήματα.
Chinook is the default skin for Kodi, removing it may cause issues
Chinook is the default skin for Kodi, removing it may cause issues
Chinook is the default skin for Kodi, removing it may cause issues
Chinook es el skin por defecto de Kodi. Borrarlo puede causar problemas
Chinook es el skin por defecto de Kodi. Desinstalarlo puede causar problemas.
Chinook es la máscara predeterminada de Kodi, eliminarla puede causar problemas
Chinook on vaikimisi Kodi rüü, selle eemaldamine võib põhjustada probleeme
Chinook Kodiren azal lehenetsia da. Ezabatzeak arazoak eragin ditzake
Chinook on Kodin oletusulkoasu, sen poisto voi aiheuttaa ongelmia
Chinook est l’habillage par défaut de Kodi, le supprimer peut créer des problèmes
Chinook est l'habillage d'origine de Kodi, le retirer peut créer des problèmes
Chinook é a pel predefinida para Kodi e eliminala pode causar problemas.
Chinook היא מעטפת ברירת המחדל של קודי, הסרתה עלולה לגרום לתקלות
Chinook je uobičajena presvlaka za Kodi, njegovim uklanjanjem može uzrokovati poteškoće
Az Chinook az alapértelmezett Kodi felszín. Eltávolítása problémákat okozhat.
Chinook er sjálfgefið skinn fyrir Kodi, ef það er fjarlægt gætu komið upp ýmis vandamál
Chinook è la skin predefinita di Kodi, rimuoverla potrebbe causare problemi
ChinookはKodiのデフォルトスキンなので、これを削除するとうまく動かなくなる可能性があります
Chinook는 Kodi의 기본스킨으로 제거시 문제가 생길 수 있습니다.
Chinook yra numatytoji Kodi teminė išvaizda, jos pašalinimas gali sukelti problemų
Chinook ialah kulit lalai Kodi, mengubahnya boleh menimbulkan isu.
Chinook er forvalgt drakt for Kodi, dersom du fjerner det kan det forårsake problemer.
Chinook is de standaardskin voor Kodi, het verwijderen van Chinook kan leiden tot problemen.
Eustary jest domyślną skórą Kodi, usunięciejej może powodować problemy
Chinook é a skin padrão para o Kodi, removendo-a pode causar problemas
O Chinook é o visual por omissão do Kodi; se o remover, poderá ter alguns problemas
Chinook este tema implicită pentru Kodi, eliminarea ei poate cauza probleme
Chinook — это стандартная обложка Kodi, и ее удаление может привести к возникновению проблем
Chinook je predvolený vzhľad pre Kodi, jeho odstránenie môže spôsobiť problémy
Chinook је подразумевана маска за Kodi, уклањање може изазвати проблеме
Chinook je podrazumevana maska za Kodi, uklanjanje može izazvati probleme
Chinook är Kodis standardskal. Om du tar bort det kan det orsaka problem.
Chinook je wychodnōm skōrōm Kodi, jij uchrōniynie może sprŏwiać niyprzileżytości
Chinook เป็นหน้าตาเริ่มต้นสำหรับ Kodi, การลบมัน อาจทำให้เกิดปัญหา
Chinook Kodi için varsayılan dış görünümdür, kaldırmak sorunlara yol açabilir
Chinook — основна обкладинка Kodi, і її видалення може призвести до проблем
Chinook là giao diện mặc định cho Kodi, loại bỏ nó có thể gây ra sự cố
Chinook 是 Kodi 的默认皮肤，删除它可能导致故障。
Chinook 是 Kodi 預設的佈景主題，移除它可能會造成問題

Az Coho az alapértelmezett felszín a 17.0 és újabb Kodi kiadásokban. Megpróbál könnyen kezelhető és használható lenni, az újonc Kodi felhasználóknak is.
Coho er sjálfgefið skinn fyrir Kodi 17.0 og nýrri. Með því á að vera auðvelt fyrir fyrsta-skiptis Kodi-notendur að skilja og nota viðmótið.
Coho è la skin predefinita di Kodi 17.0 e successivi. Cerca di essere facile da capire e usare per i nuovi utenti di Kodi.
CohoはKodi 17.0およびそれ以上のバージョンで標準のスキンです。ユーザーが初めてKodiに触れる際にわかりやすく使えるようにしてあります。
Coho는 Kodi 17.0이상의 기본 스킨입니다. 처음 Kodi를 접하는 사용자가 쉽게 이해하고 사용할 수 있도록 만들었습니다.
Coho yra numatytoji Kodi 17.0 ir aukštesnių versijų teminė išvaizda. Jos tikslas yra būti lengvai perprantama naujiems Kodi vartotojams.
Coho ialah kulit lalai untuk Kodi 17.0 dan ke atas. Kulit yang mudah digunakan buat pengguna Kodi kali pertama untuk memahami dan menggunakannya.
Coho er forvalgt drakt til Kodi 17.0 og nyere. Det tar mål av seg å være en enkel drakt for førstegangsbrukere av Kodi, slik at det er til å forstå og kan brukes.
Coho is de standaardskin voor Kodi 17.0 en hoger. Het tracht eenvoudig te begrijpen en te gebruiken te zijn voor beginnende Kodi-gebruikers.
Eustary jest domyślną skórą Kodi dla wersji 17.0 i późniejszych. Jest próbą łatwego wprowadzenia początkujących użytkowników w funkcje Kodi.
Coho é a skin padrão para o Kodi 17.0 e acima. Objetiva ser fácil para usuários que iniciam no Kodi pela primeira vez, facilitando aprendizagem de uso do mesmo.
O Coho é o visual por omissão para o Kodi 17.0 e posteriores. Tenta ser simples para os utilizadores menos experientes do Kodi compreenderem e usarem.
Coho este tema implicită pentru Kodi 17.0 și versiunile ulterioare. Încearcă să fie ușor de înțeles și folosit pentru utilizatorii care folosesc Kodi pentru prima dată.
Coho — это стандартная обложка Kodi, начиная с версии 17.0. Простая и понятная в использовании для новых пользователей Kodi.
Coho je predvolený vzhľad pre Kodi 17.0 a vyššie. Je výsledkom snahy o vzhľad, ktorý bude ľahko zrozumiteľný a použiteľný pre nových používateľov Kodi.
Coho је подразумевана маска за Kodi 17.0 и изнад. Покушава да буде једноставан за разумевање и коришћење новим корисницима Kodi-ја.
Coho je podrazumevana maska za Kodi 17.0 i iznad. Pokušava da bude jednostavan za razumevanje i korišćenje novim korisnicima Kodija.
Coho är standardskalet för Kodi 17.0 och uppåt. Det är utformat för att vara lättförståeligt och användarvänligt för förstagångsanvändare av Kodi.
Coho je wychodnōm skōrōm Kodi dlŏ wersyje 17.0 i dalszych. Prōbuje być proste dlŏ używŏczōw, dlŏ kerych Kodi je nowe
Coho คือหน้าตาเริ่มต้นของ Kodi 17.0 และสูงกว่า เป็นความพยายามที่จะทำให้ง่ายสำหรับผู้ใช้ Kodi ในครั้งแรก ที่จะเข้าใจและใช้งาน
Coho Kodi 17.0 ve yukarısı için varsayılan dış görünümdür. İlk kez Kodi kullananlar için anlaşılması ve kullanımı kolaydır.
Coho є стандартною обкладинкою Kodi 17.0 і подальших версій. Її основна ідея — простота використання для нових користувачів Kodi.
Coho là giao diện mặc định cho Kodi 17.0 trở lên. Nó dễ dàng cho người dùng Kodi lần đầu tiên hiểu và sử dụng.
Coho 是 Kodi 17.0 的默认皮肤。它力求使首次使用 Kodi 的用户易于上手。
Coho是Kodi 17.0開始搭載的預設佈景主題。主要在讓第一次使用 Kodi 的使用者可以簡單地上手。
extension.disclaimer: Coho is die bestek oortreksel vir Kodi, verwydering mag probleme veroorsaak
Coho - прадвызначаная абалонка для Kodi. Яе выдаленне можа прывесці да праблем
Coho е стандартният облик на Kodi. Премахването му може да предизвика проблеми
Coho és l'aparença predeterminada de Kodi, si s'elimina pot causar problemes.
Coho je výchozí vzhled pro Kodi, jeho odebrání může způsobit problémy
Coho yw croen diofyn Kodi. Efallai bydd ei dynnu yn achosi problemau
Coho er standard brugerfladen. Fjernes det kan der opstå problemer.
Coho ist der Standardskin von Kodi. Ein Entfernen des Skins kann Probleme verursachen.
Το Coho είναι η προεπιλεγμένη αμφίεση για το Kodi. Η αφαίρεσή του μπορεί να δημιουργήσει προβλήματα.
Coho is the default skin for Kodi, removing it may cause issues
Coho is the default skin for Kodi, removing it may cause issues
Coho is the default skin for Kodi, removing it may cause issues
Coho es el skin por defecto de Kodi. Borrarlo puede causar problemas
Coho es el skin por defecto de Kodi. Desinstalarlo puede causar problemas.
Coho es la máscara predeterminada de Kodi, eliminarla puede causar problemas
Coho on vaikimisi Kodi rüü, selle eemaldamine võib põhjustada probleeme
Coho Kodiren azal lehenetsia da. Ezabatzeak arazoak eragin ditzake
Coho on Kodin oletusulkoasu, sen poisto voi aiheuttaa ongelmia
Coho est l’habillage par défaut de Kodi, le supprimer peut créer des problèmes
Coho est l'habillage d'origine de Kodi, le retirer peut créer des problèmes
Coho é a pel predefinida para Kodi e eliminala pode causar problemas.
Coho היא מעטפת ברירת המחדל של קודי, הסרתה עלולה לגרום לתקלות
Coho je uobičajena presvlaka za Kodi, njegovim uklanjanjem može uzrokovati poteškoće
Az Coho az alapértelmezett Kodi felszín. Eltávolítása problémákat okozhat.
Coho er sjálfgefið skinn fyrir Kodi, ef það er fjarlægt gætu komið upp ýmis vandamál
Coho è la skin predefinita di Kodi, rimuoverla potrebbe causare problemi
CohoはKodiのデフォルトスキンなので、これを削除するとうまく動かなくなる可能性があります
Coho는 Kodi의 기본스킨으로 제거시 문제가 생길 수 있습니다.
Coho yra numatytoji Kodi teminė išvaizda, jos pašalinimas gali sukelti problemų
Coho ialah kulit lalai Kodi, mengubahnya boleh menimbulkan isu.
Coho er forvalgt drakt for Kodi, dersom du fjerner det kan det forårsake problemer.
Coho is de standaardskin voor Kodi, het verwijderen van Coho kan leiden tot problemen.
Eustary jest domyślną skórą Kodi, usunięciejej może powodować problemy
Coho é a skin padrão para o Kodi, removendo-a pode causar problemas
O Coho é o visual por omissão do Kodi; se o remover, poderá ter alguns problemas
Coho este tema implicită pentru Kodi, eliminarea ei poate cauza probleme
Coho — это стандартная обложка Kodi, и ее удаление может привести к возникновению проблем
Coho je predvolený vzhľad pre Kodi, jeho odstránenie môže spôsobiť problémy
Coho је подразумевана маска за Kodi, уклањање може изазвати проблеме
Coho je podrazumevana maska za Kodi, uklanjanje može izazvati probleme
Coho är Kodis standardskal. Om du tar bort det kan det orsaka problem.
Coho je wychodnōm skōrōm Kodi, jij uchrōniynie może sprŏwiać niyprzileżytości
Coho เป็นหน้าตาเริ่มต้นสำหรับ Kodi, การลบมัน อาจทำให้เกิดปัญหา
Coho Kodi için varsayılan dış görünümdür, kaldırmak sorunlara yol açabilir
Coho — основна обкладинка Kodi, і її видалення може призвести до проблем
Coho là giao diện mặc định cho Kodi, loại bỏ nó có thể gây ra sự cố
Coho 是 Kodi 的默认皮肤，删除它可能导致故障。
Coho 是 Kodi 預設的佈景主題，移除它可能會造成問題

extension.description: halibut is die bestek oortreksel vir Kodi 17.0 en op. Dit poog om maklik te wees vir eerste keer Kodi gebruikers om te verstaan en te gebruik.
halibut - прадвызначаная абалонка для Kodi 17.0 і пазнейшых версій. Яна будзе простай і зразумелай для карыстальнікаў, якія не мелі досведу працы з Kodi.
halibut е стандартният облик на Kodi 17 и по-новите версии. Целта е да се улеснят хората, които се сблъскват за първи път с Kodi.
halibut és l'aparença predeterminada de Kodi 17.0 i posteriors. Per als usuaris per primera vegada de Kodi, intenta ser fàcil d'entendre i d'utilitzar.
halibut je výchozí vzhled pro Kodi 17.0 a vyšší. Snaží se být jednoduše pochopitelný a použitelný pro nové uživatele Kodi.
halibut er standardbrugerfladen for Kodi 17.0 og højere. Det forenkler førstegangsbrugen af Kodi ved at gøre det nemmere at forstå og bruge.
halibut ist der Standardskin für Kodi 17.0 und höher. Ziel war es, einen einfach zu bedienenden Skin für neue Kodi-Benutzer zu entwickeln.
Το halibut είναι η προεπιλεγμένη αμφίεση για τις εκδόσεις Kodi 17.0 και άνω. Επιχειρεί να είναι προσιτό στους αρχάριους χρήστες του Kodi για να το κατανοήσουν και να το χρησιμοποιήσουν.
halibut is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
halibut is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
halibut is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
halibut es el skin por defecto para Kodi 17.0 y posteriores. Intenta ser fácil de entender y utilizar para los usuarios Kodi primerizos.
halibut es el skin por defecto para Kodi 17.0 o superior. Su objetivo es la facilidad de comprensión y uso para usuarios primerizos de Kodi.
halibut es la máscara por defecto para Kodi 17.0 y superior. Su objetivo es ser fácil de entender y usar para los usuarios nuevos a Kodi.
halibut on vaikimisi Kodi rüü versioonist 17.0. Kodi esmakasutajatel on rüüd kerge mõista ja kasutada.
halibut azala kodi 17.0 eta berriagoen azal lehenetsia da. Kodiren erabiltzaile hasiberrientzako erabilerraza eta ulerterraza izaten saiatzen da.
halibut on oletusulkoasu Kodin versiosta 17.0 lähtien. Se pyrkii olemaan helppo ymmärtää ja käyttää Kodin ensikäyttäjille.
halibut est l’habillage par défaut pour Kodi 17.0 et ultérieure. Il s’efforce d’être facile à comprendre et à utiliser pour les utilisateurs débutants de Kodi.
halibut est l'habillage d'origine pour Kodi 17.0 et supérieur. Il est facile à comprendre et à utiliser pour les utilisateurs novices de Kodi.
halibut é a pel predefinida para Kodi 17.0 e superior. Esta tenta ser doada de entender e usar polos usuarios recen chegados a Kodi.

extension.description: Seren is die bestek oortreksel vir Kodi 17.0 en op. Dit poog om maklik te wees vir eerste keer Kodi gebruikers om te verstaan en te gebruik.
Seren - прадвызначаная абалонка для Kodi 17.0 і пазнейшых версій. Яна будзе простай і зразумелай для карыстальнікаў, якія не мелі досведу працы з Kodi.
Seren е стандартният облик на Kodi 17 и по-новите версии. Целта е да се улеснят хората, които се сблъскват за първи път с Kodi.
Seren és l'aparença predeterminada de Kodi 17.0 i posteriors. Per als usuaris per primera vegada de Kodi, intenta ser fàcil d'entendre i d'utilitzar.
Seren je výchozí vzhled pro Kodi 17.0 a vyšší. Snaží se být jednoduše pochopitelný a použitelný pro nové uživatele Kodi.
Seren er standardbrugerfladen for Kodi 17.0 og højere. Det forenkler førstegangsbrugen af Kodi ved at gøre det nemmere at forstå og bruge.
Seren ist der Standardskin für Kodi 17.0 und höher. Ziel war es, einen einfach zu bedienenden Skin für neue Kodi-Benutzer zu entwickeln.
Το Seren είναι η προεπιλεγμένη αμφίεση για τις εκδόσεις Kodi 17.0 και άνω. Επιχειρεί να είναι προσιτό στους αρχάριους χρήστες του Kodi για να το κατανοήσουν και να το χρησιμοποιήσουν.
Seren is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
Seren is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
Seren is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
Seren es el skin por defecto para Kodi 17.0 y posteriores. Intenta ser fácil de entender y utilizar para los usuarios Kodi primerizos.
Seren es el skin por defecto para Kodi 17.0 o superior. Su objetivo es la facilidad de comprensión y uso para usuarios primerizos de Kodi.
Seren es la máscara por defecto para Kodi 17.0 y superior. Su objetivo es ser fácil de entender y usar para los usuarios nuevos a Kodi.
Seren on vaikimisi Kodi rüü versioonist 17.0. Kodi esmakasutajatel on rüüd kerge mõista ja kasutada.
Seren azala kodi 17.0 eta berriagoen azal lehenetsia da. Kodiren erabiltzaile hasiberrientzako erabilerraza eta ulerterraza izaten saiatzen da.
Seren on oletusulkoasu Kodin versiosta 17.0 lähtien. Se pyrkii olemaan helppo ymmärtää ja käyttää Kodin ensikäyttäjille.
Seren est l’habillage par défaut pour Kodi 17.0 et ultérieure. Il s’efforce d’être facile à comprendre et à utiliser pour les utilisateurs débutants de Kodi.
Seren est l'habillage d'origine pour Kodi 17.0 et supérieur. Il est facile à comprendre et à utiliser pour les utilisateurs novices de Kodi.
Seren é a pel predefinida para Kodi 17.0 e superior. Esta tenta ser doada de entender e usar polos usuarios recen chegados a Kodi.
Seren היא מעטפת ברירת המחדל של קודי מגרסאות 17.0 ומעלה. מטרת מעטפת זו היא להיות פשוטה לשימוש ולהכרה ראשונית על ידי משתמשים חדשים.
Seren je uobičajena presvlaka za Kodi 17.0 i novije inačice. To je pokušaj da se novim korisnicima olakša prvo korištenje i kasnija upotreba Kodija.
Az Seren az alapértelmezett felszín a 17.0 és újabb Kodi kiadásokban. Megpróbál könnyen kezelhető és használható lenni, az újonc Kodi felhasználóknak is.
Seren er sjálfgefið skinn fyrir Kodi 17.0 og nýrri. Með því á að vera auðvelt fyrir fyrsta-skiptis Kodi-notendur að skilja og nota viðmótið.
Seren è la skin predefinita di Kodi 17.0 e successivi. Cerca di essere facile da capire e usare per i nuovi utenti di Kodi.
SerenはKodi 17.0およびそれ以上のバージョンで標準のスキンです。ユーザーが初めてKodiに触れる際にわかりやすく使えるようにしてあります。
Seren는 Kodi 17.0이상의 기본 스킨입니다. 처음 Kodi를 접하는 사용자가 쉽게 이해하고 사용할 수 있도록 만들었습니다.
Seren yra numatytoji Kodi 17.0 ir aukštesnių versijų teminė išvaizda. Jos tikslas yra būti lengvai perprantama naujiems Kodi vartotojams.
Seren ialah kulit lalai untuk Kodi 17.0 dan ke atas. Kulit yang mudah digunakan buat pengguna Kodi kali pertama untuk memahami dan menggunakannya.
Seren er forvalgt drakt til Kodi 17.0 og nyere. Det tar mål av seg å være en enkel drakt for førstegangsbrukere av Kodi, slik at det er til å forstå og kan brukes.
Seren is de standaardskin voor Kodi 17.0 en hoger. Het tracht eenvoudig te begrijpen en te gebruiken te zijn voor beginnende Kodi-gebruikers.
Eustary jest domyślną skórą Kodi dla wersji 17.0 i późniejszych. Jest próbą łatwego wprowadzenia początkujących użytkowników w funkcje Kodi.
Seren é a skin padrão para o Kodi 17.0 e acima. Objetiva ser fácil para usuários que iniciam no Kodi pela primeira vez, facilitando aprendizagem de uso do mesmo.
O Seren é o visual por omissão para o Kodi 17.0 e posteriores. Tenta ser simples para os utilizadores menos experientes do Kodi compreenderem e usarem.
Seren este tema implicită pentru Kodi 17.0 și versiunile ulterioare. Încearcă să fie ușor de înțeles și folosit pentru utilizatorii care folosesc Kodi pentru prima dată.
Seren — это стандартная обложка Kodi, начиная с версии 17.0. Простая и понятная в использовании для новых пользователей Kodi.
Seren je predvolený vzhľad pre Kodi 17.0 a vyššie. Je výsledkom snahy o vzhľad, ktorý bude ľahko zrozumiteľný a použiteľný pre nových používateľov Kodi.
Seren је подразумевана маска за Kodi 17.0 и изнад. Покушава да буде једноставан за разумевање и коришћење новим корисницима Kodi-ја.
Seren je podrazumevana maska za Kodi 17.0 i iznad. Pokušava da bude jednostavan za razumevanje i korišćenje novim korisnicima Kodija.
Seren är standardskalet för Kodi 17.0 och uppåt. Det är utformat för att vara lättförståeligt och användarvänligt för förstagångsanvändare av Kodi.
Seren je wychodnōm skōrōm Kodi dlŏ wersyje 17.0 i dalszych. Prōbuje być proste dlŏ używŏczōw, dlŏ kerych Kodi je nowe
Seren คือหน้าตาเริ่มต้นของ Kodi 17.0 และสูงกว่า เป็นความพยายามที่จะทำให้ง่ายสำหรับผู้ใช้ Kodi ในครั้งแรก ที่จะเข้าใจและใช้งาน
Seren Kodi 17.0 ve yukarısı için varsayılan dış görünümdür. İlk kez Kodi kullananlar için anlaşılması ve kullanımı kolaydır.
Seren є стандартною обкладинкою Kodi 17.0 і подальших версій. Її основна ідея — простота використання для нових користувачів Kodi.
Seren là giao diện mặc định cho Kodi 17.0 trở lên. Nó dễ dàng cho người dùng Kodi lần đầu tiên hiểu và sử dụng.
Seren 是 Kodi 17.0 的默认皮肤。它力求使首次使用 Kodi 的用户易于上手。
Seren是Kodi 17.0開始搭載的預設佈景主題。主要在讓第一次使用 Kodi 的使用者可以簡單地上手。

extension.description: Sockeye is die bestek oortreksel vir Kodi 17.0 en op. Dit poog om maklik te wees vir eerste keer Kodi gebruikers om te verstaan en te gebruik.
Sockeye - прадвызначаная абалонка для Kodi 17.0 і пазнейшых версій. Яна будзе простай і зразумелай для карыстальнікаў, якія не мелі досведу працы з Kodi.
Sockeye е стандартният облик на Kodi 17 и по-новите версии. Целта е да се улеснят хората, които се сблъскват за първи път с Kodi.
Sockeye és l'aparença predeterminada de Kodi 17.0 i posteriors. Per als usuaris per primera vegada de Kodi, intenta ser fàcil d'entendre i d'utilitzar.
Sockeye je výchozí vzhled pro Kodi 17.0 a vyšší. Snaží se být jednoduše pochopitelný a použitelný pro nové uživatele Kodi.
Sockeye er standardbrugerfladen for Kodi 17.0 og højere. Det forenkler førstegangsbrugen af Kodi ved at gøre det nemmere at forstå og bruge.
Sockeye ist der Standardskin für Kodi 17.0 und höher. Ziel war es, einen einfach zu bedienenden Skin für neue Kodi-Benutzer zu entwickeln.
Το Sockeye είναι η προεπιλεγμένη αμφίεση για τις εκδόσεις Kodi 17.0 και άνω. Επιχειρεί να είναι προσιτό στους αρχάριους χρήστες του Kodi για να το κατανοήσουν και να το χρησιμοποιήσουν.
Sockeye is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
Sockeye is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
Sockeye is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
Sockeye es el skin por defecto para Kodi 17.0 y posteriores. Intenta ser fácil de entender y utilizar para los usuarios Kodi primerizos.
Sockeye es el skin por defecto para Kodi 17.0 o superior. Su objetivo es la facilidad de comprensión y uso para usuarios primerizos de Kodi.
Sockeye es la máscara por defecto para Kodi 17.0 y superior. Su objetivo es ser fácil de entender y usar para los usuarios nuevos a Kodi.
Sockeye on vaikimisi Kodi rüü versioonist 17.0. Kodi esmakasutajatel on rüüd kerge mõista ja kasutada.
Sockeye azala kodi 17.0 eta berriagoen azal lehenetsia da. Kodiren erabiltzaile hasiberrientzako erabilerraza eta ulerterraza izaten saiatzen da.
Sockeye on oletusulkoasu Kodin versiosta 17.0 lähtien. Se pyrkii olemaan helppo ymmärtää ja käyttää Kodin ensikäyttäjille.
Sockeye est l’habillage par défaut pour Kodi 17.0 et ultérieure. Il s’efforce d’être facile à comprendre et à utiliser pour les utilisateurs débutants de Kodi.
Sockeye est l'habillage d'origine pour Kodi 17.0 et supérieur. Il est facile à comprendre et à utiliser pour les utilisateurs novices de Kodi.
Sockeye é a pel predefinida para Kodi 17.0 e superior. Esta tenta ser doada de entender e usar polos usuarios recen chegados a Kodi.
Sockeye היא מעטפת ברירת המחדל של קודי מגרסאות 17.0 ומעלה. מטרת מעטפת זו היא להיות פשוטה לשימוש ולהכרה ראשונית על ידי משתמשים חדשים.
Sockeye je uobičajena presvlaka za Kodi 17.0 i novije inačice. To je pokušaj da se novim korisnicima olakša prvo korištenje i kasnija upotreba Kodija.
Az Sockeye az alapértelmezett felszín a 17.0 és újabb Kodi kiadásokban. Megpróbál könnyen kezelhető és használható lenni, az újonc Kodi felhasználóknak is.
Sockeye er sjálfgefið skinn fyrir Kodi 17.0 og nýrri. Með því á að vera auðvelt fyrir fyrsta-skiptis Kodi-notendur að skilja og nota viðmótið.
Sockeye è la skin predefinita di Kodi 17.0 e successivi. Cerca di essere facile da capire e usare per i nuovi utenti di Kodi.
SockeyeはKodi 17.0およびそれ以上のバージョンで標準のスキンです。ユーザーが初めてKodiに触れる際にわかりやすく使えるようにしてあります。
Sockeye는 Kodi 17.0이상의 기본 스킨입니다. 처음 Kodi를 접하는 사용자가 쉽게 이해하고 사용할 수 있도록 만들었습니다.
Sockeye yra numatytoji Kodi 17.0 ir aukštesnių versijų teminė išvaizda. Jos tikslas yra būti lengvai perprantama naujiems Kodi vartotojams.
Sockeye ialah kulit lalai untuk Kodi 17.0 dan ke atas. Kulit yang mudah digunakan buat pengguna Kodi kali pertama untuk memahami dan menggunakannya.
Sockeye er forvalgt drakt til Kodi 17.0 og nyere. Det tar mål av seg å være en enkel drakt for førstegangsbrukere av Kodi, slik at det er til å forstå og kan brukes.
Sockeye is de standaardskin voor Kodi 17.0 en hoger. Het tracht eenvoudig te begrijpen en te gebruiken te zijn voor beginnende Kodi-gebruikers.
Eustary jest domyślną skórą Kodi dla wersji 17.0 i późniejszych. Jest próbą łatwego wprowadzenia początkujących użytkowników w funkcje Kodi.
Sockeye é a skin padrão para o Kodi 17.0 e acima. Objetiva ser fácil para usuários que iniciam no Kodi pela primeira vez, facilitando aprendizagem de uso do mesmo.
O Sockeye é o visual por omissão para o Kodi 17.0 e posteriores. Tenta ser simples para os utilizadores menos experientes do Kodi compreenderem e usarem.
Sockeye este tema implicită pentru Kodi 17.0 și versiunile ulterioare. Încearcă să fie ușor de înțeles și folosit pentru utilizatorii care folosesc Kodi pentru prima dată.
Sockeye — это стандартная обложка Kodi, начиная с версии 17.0. Простая и понятная в использовании для новых пользователей Kodi.
Sockeye je predvolený vzhľad pre Kodi 17.0 a vyššie. Je výsledkom snahy o vzhľad, ktorý bude ľahko zrozumiteľný a použiteľný pre nových používateľov Kodi.
Sockeye је подразумевана маска за Kodi 17.0 и изнад. Покушава да буде једноставан за разумевање и коришћење новим корисницима Kodi-ја.
Sockeye je podrazumevana maska za Kodi 17.0 i iznad. Pokušava da bude jednostavan za razumevanje i korišćenje novim korisnicima Kodija.
Sockeye är standardskalet för Kodi 17.0 och uppåt. Det är utformat för att vara lättförståeligt och användarvänligt för förstagångsanvändare av Kodi.
Sockeye je wychodnōm skōrōm Kodi dlŏ wersyje 17.0 i dalszych. Prōbuje być proste dlŏ używŏczōw, dlŏ kerych Kodi je nowe
Sockeye คือหน้าตาเริ่มต้นของ Kodi 17.0 และสูงกว่า เป็นความพยายามที่จะทำให้ง่ายสำหรับผู้ใช้ Kodi ในครั้งแรก ที่จะเข้าใจและใช้งาน
Sockeye Kodi 17.0 ve yukarısı için varsayılan dış görünümdür. İlk kez Kodi kullananlar için anlaşılması ve kullanımı kolaydır.
Sockeye є стандартною обкладинкою Kodi 17.0 і подальших версій. Її основна ідея — простота використання для нових користувачів Kodi.
Sockeye là giao diện mặc định cho Kodi 17.0 trở lên. Nó dễ dàng cho người dùng Kodi lần đầu tiên hiểu và sử dụng.
Sockeye 是 Kodi 17.0 的默认皮肤。它力求使首次使用 Kodi 的用户易于上手。
Sockeye是Kodi 17.0開始搭載的預設佈景主題。主要在讓第一次使用 Kodi 的使用者可以簡單地上手。

Sockeye - прадвызначаная абалонка для Kodi. Яе выдаленне можа прывесці да праблем
Sockeye е стандартният облик на Kodi. Премахването му може да предизвика проблеми
